job_details.full_text:
Automation Engineer

 Zo ga jij deze uitdaging aan In deze boeiende rol als Engineer in het Automation Team ben je verantwoordelijk voor het bouwen en beheren van innovatieve automatiseringsoplossingen die cruciaal zijn voor onze netbeheeroperaties. Dit omvat het ontwikkelen van op maat gemaakte automatiseringen met behulp van UiPath, Node-Red en het Power Platform, evenals het beheren en verbeteren van bestaande automatiseringen. Dit zijn jouw ver...

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on automation using tools like UiPath and Node-Red, and mentions the Power Platform. While automation is related to AI, the core responsibilities described do not align with the specialized tasks of an ML Engineer or GenAI Engineer as defined in the coding book. The role appears to be more focused on traditional automation and workflow management rather than advanced AI model development or deployment.

job_tasks.justification: The description mentions 'building and managing innovative automation solutions' and 'developing custom automations', which aligns with software development principles applied to automation.
job_tasks.phrase: building and managing innovative automation solutions

job_tasks.justification: Developing custom automations using specific tools falls under software development.
The phrase 'managing and improving existing automations' implies operational responsibilities for deployed solutions.
